title: Hypergraph-based Zero-shot Multi-modal Product Attribute Value Extraction
details: J Hu, J Gong, H Shen, H Eldardiry - THE WEB CONFERENCE 2025
abstract: It is essential for e-commerce platforms to provide accurate, complete, and timely product attribute values, in order to improve the search and recommendation experience for both customers and sellers. In the real-world scenario, it is difficult for …
